org.opengrok.indexer.util

Interface ObjectValidator<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of objects to validate and cleanup
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CtagsValidator

    public interface ObjectValidator<T>
    Represents an API for validation of an object of the pool and for its subsequently cleanup to invalidate it.
    Author:
    Swaranga

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void invalidate(T t)
      Performs any cleanup activities before discarding the object.
      boolean isValid(T t)
      Checks whether the object is valid.

    • Method Detail

      • isValid

        boolean isValid(T t)
        Checks whether the object is valid.
        Parameters:
        t - the object to check.
        Returns:
        true if the object is valid

      • invalidate

        void invalidate(T t)
        Performs any cleanup activities before discarding the object. For example before discarding database connection objects, the pool will want to close the connections. This is done via the invalidate() method.
        Parameters:
        t - the object to cleanup
